sections.summary:
Assertive, outgoing professional with ability to work independently and handle simultaneous projects. A dependable worker while skilled in
problem solving, troubleshooting, great customer service and computer skills. My computer skills include Microsoft Office/Internet search engines
to complete medical terminology and pharmacology verification. Inside sales department successfully managing multiple sales associates. Accurate
and efficient with orders. Maintained filing for the inside sales office.
Highlights
Self-directed
Invoice processing
Excellent communication skills
Advanced clerical knowledge
Resourceful
Pleasant demeanor
Time management
Understands grammar
